R

Reactor - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors
A reactor is a light-weight thread dedicated to processing requests and responses (requests with a response value).
ReactorBase - Class in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors
Base class for reactors.
ReactorBase() - Constructor for class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
 
ReactorClosedException - Exception in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors
This exception is thrown when passing a Request to a reactor and that reactor is closed.
ReactorClosedException() - Constructor for exception org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorClosedException
Constructs a new runtime exception with null as its detail message.
ReactorClosedException(String) - Constructor for exception org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorClosedException
Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified detail message.
ReactorClosedException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorClosedException
Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified detail message and cause.
ReactorClosedException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorClosedException
Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
ReactorClosedException(String, Throwable, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for exception org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorClosedException
Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified detail message, cause, suppression enabled or disabled, and writable stack trace enabled or disabled.
ReactorImpl - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors
Base class for internal reactor implementations.
removeCloseable(Closeable) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.Reactor
Unregister a Closeable.
removeCloseable(Closeable) - Method in class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
 
removeCloseable(Closeable) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorImpl
Remove a closeable from the list of closeables.
removeReactor(ReactorImpl) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.closeable.CloseableImpl
Called by a reactorImpl to remove itself from the closeable's set of dependencies.
Request<RESPONSE_TYPE> - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests
A request is a single-use object for performing an operation safely and to optionally be passed back with a response value that is also processed safely.
requestBegin(RequestImpl) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorImpl
Signals the start of a request.
requestEnd(RequestImpl) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorImpl
Signals that a request has completed.
RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE> - Interface in org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests
API for internal request implementations.
responseProcessed() - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.RequestImpl
A response value from a subordinate request has been processed.
responseReceived(RequestImpl) - Method in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.RequestImpl
A response has been received for a subordinate request.
run() - Method in class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.SwingBoundReactor
 
run() - Method in class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ThreadBoundReactor
Call by the bound thread to process the requests/responses in the input queue.
